long_description: Capped with a top lid, the Osprey Stratos 36 Pack is a roomy, comfortable hauler for day hikes and light overnight excursions. Lightweight alloy frame, cross struts and a tensioned mesh back panel give you support and flexibility while carrying heavy loads. Breathable mesh and molded waffle foam cushion contact points on shoulder straps and hipbelt; hipbelt has forward-pull closure. Zippered panel-loading design gives you easy access to the pack's contents. Internal sleeve with hanger holds a hydration reservoir (sold separately); central exit port and stretch webbing on the shoulder straps secure the drinking tube. Large, zippered front pocket is ideal for stashing a jacket, hat or guide book. Mesh side pockets; zippered top pocket; zippered mesh pockets on hipbelt and right shoulder strap. The Osprey Stratos 36 Pack has an integrated raincover, top grab handle, trekking pole attachment point and single ice axe attachment loop with a central handle clip. Closeout.
short_description: Capped with a top lid, the Osprey Stratos 36 Pack is a roomy, comfortable hauler for day hikes and light overnight excursions.
